07/12/13 11:19:25 ERROR "Can't evaluate PREEMPT" at line 1649 in file /usr/local/condor/local/execute/slot2/dir_90080/userdir/src/condor_startd.V6/Resource.cpp

07/12/13 11:19:25 startd exiting because of fatal exception.
remarks: Looks like a race condition, where we don't set ATTR_TOTAL_CLAIM_RUN_TIME if it has been running for zero seconds when we publish the ad.
creator: bt
